attributes.action: Ban advertising on television on any channels available in the United Kingdom, except on channels which only show adverts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The available resources on the planet cannot match the insatiability of the rampant consumerism that is threatening our climate and our very survival. A stand should be made against consumerism, and this can start by making the showing of adverts illegal. There would be licenced adverts on channels which only aired adverts. If someone wanted to buy something, they would choose to watch the advert for the product. If this brings leads to the closure of commercial station, so be it. Better this way, than having the american model of no quality TV, just lots of adverts, urging immoral, distasteful and ultimately dangerous consumerism.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
